SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.core.log.error

Interface ErrorReporter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ErrorReporterBase, ErrorReporterForTask, ErrorReporterIntoLog, ErrorReporterIntoString
public interface ErrorReporter
Reports errors as they occur.

A lower category of "error", styled a warning that can be reported.

Author:
Owen Feehan

  • Method Details

    • recordError

      void recordError(Class<?> classOriginating, String message, Throwable exc)
      Reports an error that occurred as an exception, with a message first introducing it.
      Parameters:
      classOriginating - a class in which the error originates (where it was thrown).
      message - the message explaining the error.
      exc - the error that occurred.

    • recordError

      void recordError(Class<?> classOriginating, Throwable exc)
      Reports an error that occurred as an exception
      Parameters:
      classOriginating - a class in which the error originates (where it was thrown)
      exc - the error that occurred

    • recordError

      void recordError(Class<?> classOriginating, String message)
      Reports an error with a constant string error message.
      Parameters:
      classOriginating - a class in which the error originates (where it was thrown)
      message - a message describing the error that occurred

    • recordWarning

      void recordWarning(String message)
      Reports an warning with a constant string error message.
      Parameters:
      message - a message describing the warning.

    • hasWarningOccurred

      boolean hasWarningOccurred()
      Checks if at least one warning has been outputted.
      Returns:
      true if at least one warning has occurred, false otherwise.

    • recordErrorFormatted

      default void recordErrorFormatted(Class<?> classOriginating, String format, Object... args)
      Reports an error with a string derived from a format-string.
      Parameters:
      classOriginating - a class in which the error originates (where it was thrown)
      format - the format-string for the error message
      args - the other arguments for the format-string like in String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...).

    • recordWarningFormatted

      default void recordWarningFormatted(String format, Object... args)
      Reports an warning with a string derived from a format-string.
      Parameters:
      format - the format-string for the warning message
      args - the other arguments for the format-string like in String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...).
